item.title: When driving on the wrong side of the road is the right way to speed up traffic
item.description: An unconventional design known as the diverging diamond interchange can be both safer and more efficient than conventional left turn lanes. Road planners across the country are switching sides.

item.title: Alleged sexual misconduct by lawyers isn't uncommon. But facing punishment is tricky
item.description: Melissa Rogozinski's story of sexual assault in 2016 serves as a reminder that when lawyers are accused of sexual misconduct, there is rarely substantial punishment, one expert says.

item.title: Her father was killed in a climate-driven flood. Here's how she's remembering him
item.description: Mandy Messinger is one of hundreds who lose loved ones to climate-linked extreme weather each year in the U.S. Her father Craig Messinger was killed in a 2021 flash flood in the Philadelphia suburbs.
